title: Smoky BBQ Salmon
description: Limited time only! Salmon chunks, cream cheese, onions with fresh capsicums, baked on a sweet and smoky BBQ sauce.

title: Cheesy Hawaiian
description: Cheese Lovers rejoice! The elevated experience of our crowed favorite tender chicken ham combined with sweet and succulent pineapple chunks, paired with the wondrous 5 blend cheese & cream cheese.

title: Hawaiian
description: An all-time favourite. Tender chicken ham combined with sweet and succulent pineapple chunks for a taste of the good ol' days.

title: Chicken Supreme
description: Sink your teeth into a generous spread of savoury chicken ham, spicy chicken chunks, roasted chicken, topped with onions, capsicums and mushrooms.

title: Beyond™ Supreme
description: Introducing the Beyond Meat™, made with Beyond Meat's plant based Italian Sausage Crumbles which leaves a hint of herbs and spice aroma, with capsicums, onions and mushrooms, on a bed of our signature sweet sauce. Approved by Carnivore!

title: Super Supreme
description: Always a house favourite, combining juicy ground beef, smoky beef cabanossi sausages, beef pepperoni, chicken ham, and a luscious mix of capsicums, onions, olives, mushrooms and pineapple chunks.

title: Curry Chicken
description: Italian classic meets local favourite. Spicy chicken chunks, potatoes, onions and diced tomatoes come together for an authentic flavour of rich spices.

title: Meat Galore
description: The perfect meat-lover's choice. Chicken ham, pepperoni, minced beef and beef cabanossi sausages, with tomato mozzarella melt.

title: Beef Pepperoni
description: Combining the aromatic flavour of beef pepperoni and 100% mozzarella cheese. Classic treat that’s always a great choice.

title: Veggie Lover's
description: Delightful combination of garden fresh mushrooms, onions, olives and capsicums, sweetened with pineapple chunks and diced tomatoes.

title: BBQ Chunky Chic
description: Spicy chicken chunks together with pineapples chunks and onions, baked on a sweet and smoky BBQ sauce.

title: BBQ Beyond™
description: Juicy Beyond™ Meat made with Beyond Meat's plant based Italian Sausage Crumbles which leaves a hint ofherbs and spice aroma, with sweet corn, on a bed of sweet and smokey BBQ sauce!

title: Cheese 'n' Chic
description: Roasted chicken chunks, pineapple chunks and mushrooms, with mozzarella cheese and parsley.

title: Chic Ham 'n' Shroom
description: Tender chicken ham with mushrooms.

title: Simply Cheese
description: Freshly grated cheddar and mozzarella cheese, baked with diced tomatoes in Alfredo sauce.

title: Very Beefy
description: A marriage of beef cabanossi sausages and ground beef with a hint of onion.

title: BBQ Chicken
description: Spicy chicken chunks, chicken ham, luscious pineapple chunks with fresh capsicums, baked on a sweet and smoky BBQ sauce.

title: Hawaiian Supreme
description: Chunky chicken ham, chicken ham slices and pineapples finished with a creamy cheese drizzle.

title: The Four Cheese
description: Send your tastebuds into a cheesy frenzy with a divine combination of 4 cheeses - mozzarella, parmesan, cheddar and cream cheese.

title: Truffle Shuffle
description: Marinated truffle mushrooms, cherry tomatoes and mozzarella cheese baked on top of creamy alfredo sauce.
